mapper.select:
select users_companies.id, users_companies.ref_user, users_companies.ref_company,
users.name as user_name, companies.name as company_name
from users_companies
inner join users on users_companies.ref_user = users.id
inner join companies on users_companies.ref_company = companies.id
where users_companies.ref_user = #{ref_user}
order by users_companies.id
